item.title: Easily switch between Hyper-V and VirtualBox
item.description: Hyper-V and VirtualBox are two virtualization platforms that we both use in our system administration courses. Unfortunately, once Hyper-V is active, it won’t coexist with other virtualization platforms. In this post, I discuss a method to work around this problem by setting up a custom boot entry for each platform.
